divs: Sighting Details was on the roof watching stars with zoom bionoculars,observed two points of light that were glowing from white to amber light,to dull white to intense white light in glowing haze about a mile apart in tandum movement, with black outline that blocked out stars as it passed.The object was witnessed for 44 seconds.
Summary: two points of light in cigar shape with black outline
trends: There have been 83 other sightings in Sacramento
There were no other sightings in Sacramento on or around July 27th 2012
